instructions_to_main_agent.1: Use 'Barlow Condensed' for ALL headings. It is the signature look.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: The Chatbot Widget must look like a TOOL, not a toy. Use dark mode for the widget itself even on the light landing page.
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Use 'Volt Blue' (#2563EB) for primary actions, but use 'High Voltage Yellow' (#FACC15) for 'Spark' moments (icons, special highlights).
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Landing Page Layout: Use the 'Bento Grid' style provided in the layout section. Do not just stack sections vertically.
instructions_to_main_agent.5: Forms: Use the 'Technical Input' style (thick bottom border, no background) to feel like filling out a work order.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Dashboard: Keep it dense and data-heavy. Use the 'High Density Grid' logic.
instructions_to_main_agent.7: Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Pick 'industrial' icons (zap, activity, settings, wrench, clipboard).
instructions_to_main_agent.8: Implement a 'Consultation Mode' toggle in the dashboard if possible (just a visual toggle).
instructions_to_main_agent.9: Ensure the 'Add Power Electrics' branding is clear: Reliable, Local, Tech-Savvy.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.design_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
anti_patterns: No gradient text unless it's a very subtle metal sheen.
No rounded-full buttons (pill shape) - stick to rounded-sm or rounded-md for the industrial feel.
No generic 'Contact Us' layout. Make it a 'Service Request' terminal.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met. The Yellow (#FACC15) must use BLACK text, never white.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.component_reuse: Customize shadcn components to match the 'Industrial' theme (square corners, thicker borders).
